titles.title: Calling on the Emir of Kuwait to provide funds for research, diagnosis, treatment, and compensation relating to injuries and illnesses suffered by United States veterans who served in the Persian Gulf War.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on International Relations.

bill.summary: 11/6/1997--Introduced. Calls on Jabir Al-Sabah, the Emir of Kuwait, to provide funds for research, diagnosis, treatment, and compensation relating to injuries and illnesses suffered by U.S. veterans who served in the Persian Gulf War, until funds for such purposes can be obtained from Iraq.
